channel.title: AvatarPkz 317 -HybridPvp V3- Need Developers
channel.description:
Hello, I've been working on a new 317 PK server, AvatarPkz. I'm currently in need of two assistants. What I'm looking for is people who can:
Create a webclient Help design a website, I can do most of it by myself Have creative and fun ideas for the server Help set up the server on a VPS Minor help with coding, I can do most of it Implement a perfect dicing system utilizing dice bags Create an extreme server that ANYBODY can enjoy
To apply, follow the form below. First, read some about the server!
Pk Server 317, Hybrid PVP V3 The only skill that will be focused on is Slayer, besides the combat stats of course Just bought a VPS for the server, need help setting it up Created a website PK BASED!!! NOTHING ELSE!! For fun only, not in this for the profits and power!
To apply, say some things about yourself in this format:
Timezone: Age: Experience: Experience with PI: What you can contribute: Why you think you should get the job: Anything else you feel neccesary to add in:
As payment for your work you can either be a head admin (co-owner), get 1/3 of the donations, or receive 100k donator tokens in game and moderator status
REPLY!

item.title: AvatarPkz 317 -HybridPvp V3- Need Developers
item.dc:creator: @DawgTastic DawgTastic
item.description:
@DawgTastic wrote:

Timezone: Central
Age:19
Experience: 5 Years of Hosting / Coding my own 317 server.
Experience with PI: Yes, a good bit.
What you can contribute: coding assistance, maintenance of server and forums.
Why you think you should get the job: I’m very easy to get along with, As well as i have a professional approach to each situation i come across.
Anything else you feel neccesary to add in:Hard Worker, Mod / Head Admin on several servers over the past 5 years.

Read full topic

@iDoSkillzzz wrote:

Hello, I’ve been working on a new 317 PK server, AvatarPkz. I’m currently in need of two assistants. What I’m looking for is people who can:

Create a webclient
Help design a website, I can do most of it by myself
Have creative and fun ideas for the server
Help set up the server on a VPS
Minor help with coding, I can do most of it
Implement a perfect dicing system utilizing dice bags
Create an extreme server that ANYBODY can enjoy

To apply, follow the form below. First, read some about the server!

Pk Server
317, Hybrid PVP V3
The only skill that will be focused on is Slayer, besides the combat stats of course
Just bought a VPS for the server, need help setting it up
Created a website
PK BASED!!! NOTHING ELSE!!
For fun only, not in this for the profits and power!

To apply, say some things about yourself in this format:

Timezone:
Age:
Experience:
Experience with PI:
What you can contribute:
Why you think you should get the job:
Anything else you feel neccesary to add in:

As payment for your work you can either be a head admin (co-owner), get 1/3 of the donations, or receive 100k donator tokens in game and moderator status
